description: THE PERFECT BABY BOW STARTS WITH THE PERFECT HEADBAND.

Whether you craft homemade baby bows and hair accessories for a living, or simply handcraft cute styles for your own children, you deserve a headband that won't stretch out or leave horrible red marks on sensitive little heads. Don't sacrifice quality, choose a Cherubb headband instead!
Our premium nylon headbands are easy to clean and care for. If they get dirty, simply hand wash gently using warm soap and water and let air dry. That's it!
Our universal premium nylon headbands stretch to fit virtually any size head which means your bows and hair accessories can grow with your child for years to come!

Don't cut corners with lower quality headbands. Cherubb premium nylon headbands are super soft and comfortable and won't leave red marks on the sensitive skin of newborns like most lower quality bands will.
Our headbands are made to withstand the bustle of daily wear. They are super stretchy and hold their shape and elasticity without easily stretching out or getting runs.
If for any reason you are unhappy with your purchase we will refund your entire order, no questions asked!
